item.description: I-80 East at Exit 102 - BL-80/Bus. US-30/Dewar Drive. Next exit is College Drive which is unsigned on this assembly. The exit after that is Exit 104 - US-191 North/Elk St. I-80/US-30 continues east towards Cheyenne.

item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 102. Use Exit 102 for WY-430 south.

item.description: I-80 East at Exit 66 - US-30 West/Kemmerer/Pocatello. US-30 joins I-80 eastbound to just east of Rawlins.

item.description: I-84 east at Exit 259 - US-30/La Grande/National Historic District. Overhead for I-84 to Baker City and Ontario. US-30 leaves I-84 eastbound here, and rejoins with I-84 on the other side of LaGrande. LaGrande is the county seat of Union County.

item.title: End OR-244 at I-84/US-30
item.description: End OR-244 at I-84/US-30 at Hilgard Junction. Merge right for I-84/US-30 East to LaGrande; merge left for I-84/US-30 west to Hilgard and Pendleton.

item.title: I-86 East - Freeway Entrance
item.description: Freeway Entrance on I-86 east. This style sign assembly for freeway entrances is not very common in Idaho. Also, note that the I-86 shield has the text IDAHO in it, which is also pretty rare. Most of the interstate shields that have the text IDAHO in them are older. This sign appears to be newer.

item.title: I-86 Exit 36 Offramp at BL-86/ID-37
item.description: I-86 Exit 36 offramp at BL-86/ID-37. Turn right on ID-37 south for Rockland. Turn left for BL-86 East to American Falls and Aberdeen (via ID-39). This is the west end of the American Falls business loop.

item.title: I-86 (Exit 21) Offramp at Coldwater Area
item.description: I-86/US-30 East (Exit 21) Offramp at Coldwater Area jct. Turn right for Coldwater Area and Frontage Road.

item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 216 - ID-25/ID-77/Declo/Albion.

item.description: I-84 east at Exit 44 - ID-69 South/Meridian/Kuna. This interchange was rebuilt in 2015 as a SPUI. The ID-69 shield in attached to the exit sign incorrectly has the state of Idaho filled in all black. Normally on these types of state highway shields on freeway junctions, the state is shown white with a black outline and black text.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd/Idaho Center Blvd. Use I-84 east for Meridian and Boise. This is the eastern end of the Nampa/Caldwell business loop.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 38 - BL-84/Idaho Center Blvd./Garrity Blvd.

item.description: Distance marker on US-30 east. Distance to Huntington and Ontario.

item.description: US-30 east approaching OR-7. Use left lane for Richland and Halfway. Both of these communities are along OR-86 between Baker City and Hells Canyon.

item.description: US-30 east along Broadway in Baker City.

item.description: I-84 East (Exit 54) Offramp at Broadway Ave. (US-20/US-26) in Boise. Turn left for US-20/US-26 West/Broadway Ave. to Boise State University, Convention Center, and City Center. Turn right for Industrial Park.

item.description: I-84 east at Exit 53 - Vista Ave./Boise Airport. Approaching Exit 54 - Broadway Ave.

item.description: I-84 east overhead, and approaching Exit 53 - Vista Ave./Airport.

item.description: Entering Bannock County on US-30 west.

item.description: US-30 west at Fish Creek Summit.

item.description: ID-34 South approaching US-30 in Soda Springs. ID-34 south joins US-30 east through Soda Springs.

item.description: I-84 east at Exit 57 - ID-21/Idaho City/Gowen Road.

item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 57 - ID-21/Idaho City/Gowen Road.

item.description: I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30 east shields. Four highways join together between Boise and Mountain Home, which is the most overlaps of any stretch of highway in Idaho. Notice the US highway shields are missing the surrounding black box. This stretch of highway was recently widened, and it was probably incorrectly placed by a contractor.

item.description: I-84 east at Exit 54 - Broadway Ave. I-84/US-30 continues east to Mountain Home. US-20 and US-26 join I-84 eastbound here.

item.description: Cole Road South at I-84 East to Mountain Home.

item.description: 10th St. East at I-84 East to Ontario, and Portland. This is one of the few instances of Portland used as a control city on I-84.

item.description: 10th St. East at I-84 East (Exit 28). Turn right on I-84 for Nampa and Boise. Continue east on 10th St. for I-84 East to Ontario (Oregon).

item.description: Distance marker on US-30 west. Distance to New Plymouth, Fruitland, and Payette.

item.description: End ID-72 west at US-30 in Payette County. Use US-30 west for I-84.

item.description: End ID-72 west at US-30. Turn right for US-30 west to New Plymouth and Emmett. Turn left for US-30 east to I-84.

item.description: End ID-72 approaching US-30 in Payette County.

item.description: Speed Limit 80/Truck Speed 70 on I-84 east. Idaho raised the speed limits on most rural interstates from 75 to 80 in July 2014.

item.description: BL-84 west approaching I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30 in Mountain Home. This is the western end of the Mountain Home business loop.

item.title: I-84 East - Speed Limit 80
item.description: Speed Limit 80 MPH on I-84 east. Truck speed limit 70 MPH. The speed limit in Idaho was raised in July 2014. Utah, Texas, and Wyoming also have speed limits this high.

item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 376A - Bus. US-30/Ontario/Treasure Valley Community College. Approaching Exit 376B - US-30 East/Fruitland/Payette. Both Fruitland and Payette are in Idaho.

item.description: I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30 east at Exit 95 - US-20 East/To BL-84/Mountain Home/Fairfield. It is unclear why this sign lists I-84 with the text TO, because BL-84 joins I-84 at this interchange. US-20 leaves I-84 eastbound.

item.description: US-93 south at US-30 east to Twin Falls. Continue south on US-93 for Jackpot (NV) and Wells (NV). This sign is not typical in that the font is in all capital letters. Typically this sort of sign is not all upper case.

item.description: US-93 south at US-30 interchange. Turn right for US-30 west; continue under overpass for US-30 east.

item.title: US-93 South Approaching US-30 West
item.description: US-93 South approaching US-30 West. Use US-30 west for Filer.

item.description: I-80 west at Exit 104 - BL-80/Business US-30/To WY-430/Pilot Butte Ave. Approaching Exit 104 - US-191 North/Elk St. I-80/US-30 continues west towards Green River. This is the western end of the Rock Springs business loop.

item.description: Rock Springs - Next 4 Exits on I-80 west.

item.description: I-80 west at Exit 111 - Airport Road/Baxter Road.

item.description: I-80 west - Elevation 8640. This is the highest point on all of I-80. The summit lies between Cheyenne and Laramie in the Sherman Mountains.

item.description: Distance marker on I-80 west. Distance to Laramie, and Rock Springs.

item.description: I-80 west at Exit 358 - West Lincolnway. This is the western end of the Cheyenne business loop. US-30 rejoins I-80 here westbound.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 370
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 370 - US-30 West/Archer. US-30 leaves I-80 westbound here, and rejoins on the west side of Cheyenne.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 377
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 377 - Hillsdale.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 386
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 386 - WY-213/WY-214/Burns/Carpenter.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 391
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 391 - Egbert.

item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 401 - To WY-215/Pine Bluffs. This is the first exit in Wyoming along I-80 west. US-30 joins I-80 westbound at Exit 401 into Cheyenne.

item.description: US-30 east at NE-53E Link. Use NE-53E Link for NE-71 and I-80 (via NE-71).

item.description: Chestnut St. North approaching US-30 in Kimball. Chestnut St. used to be the route of NE-71 before it was rerouted east of town.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East Approaching I-84/US-30
item.description: US-20/US-26 east approaching I-84/US-30 onramp.

item.description: End OR-203 north at I-84/US-30. Turn left for I-84 west; continue under freeway for I-84 east.

item.description: End OR-203 at I-84/US-30 junction. Turn left for I-84 west to Pendleton; continue straight for I-84 east, and US-30 west to La Grande.

item.title: US-30 West at I-84 and OR-237
item.description: US-30 west at I-84 and OR-237. US-30 joins I-84 west to La Grande. Continue straight for OR-237 and North Powder.

item.description: US-30 West at Anthony Lakes Jct. and I-84. Turn left for Anthony Lakes (Ski Area). Turn right for North Powder I-84/US-30 west to La Grande.

item.description: 45th Parallel - Halfway Between Equator and North Pole. Taken on US-30 west between Haines and North Powder.

item.description: Entering Haines on US-30 west.

item.title: US-30 West - Anthony Lakes Jct.
item.description: US-30 west approaching Anthony Lakes Junction in Haines. Anthony Lakes is a ski area.

item.description: Beginning of ID-44 east at I-84/US-30 West onramp (Exit 25). Turn left on I-84/US-30 West for Ontario. Continue straight for ID-44 east to Middleton and Star.

item.title: I-84 East (Exit 25) at ID-44
item.description: I-84 East (Exit 25) at ID-44 junction. Turn left for ID-44 east to Middleton. Continue ahead for the onramp for I-84/US-30 towards Caldwell and Boise.

item.description: US-30 east at I-84 (Exit 306) onramp. US-30 joins I-84 east to Huntington. This is the eastern entrance to Baker City. Use I-84 East/US-30 East for Ontario. Use I-84 West for La Grande.

item.description: US-30 West/OR-7 east in Baker City. Turn left for US-30 west to North Baker Business District, Haines, and Anthony Lakes. Continue straight for OR-7 east, to I-84, Richland, and La Grande.

item.description: US-30 West/(OR-7 East) along Main St. in Baker City. Continue along Main St. for I-84 (via OR-7).

item.title: OR-7 East at US-30
item.description: OR-7 east at US-30 in Baker City. Turn right on US-30 east for Ontario and Huntington. Continue straight on US-30 West/OR-7 East for La Grande and Portland.

item.title: OR-7 East Approaching US-30
item.description: OR-7 east approaching US-30 in Baker City.

item.description: BL-84 east at I-84 west interchange (Exit 95) in Mountain Home. Turn left for I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30 west towards Boise. Continue straight ahead for US-20 east to Fairfield. This is the eastern end of the Mountain Home business loop.

item.title: BL-84 East at I-84/US-20
item.description: BL-84 east at I-84/US-30/US-20/US-26 jct. Turn right for I-84/US-26/US-30 east towards Twin Falls. Continue under overpass for I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30 west towards Boise. Continue past intersection for US-20 east towards Fairfield. This is the east end of the Mountain Home business loop.

item.title: BL-84 East Approaching I-84/US-20
item.description: BL-84 east approaching I-84/US-20 junction (Exit 95) in Mountain Home.

item.description: Old US-30 at I-84 East/BL-84 junction. Turn left on I-84 east towards Bliss and Twin Falls. Continue straight for BL-84 into Glenns Ferry.

item.title: Old US-30 at I-84/BL-84
item.description: Old US-30 at I-84/BL-84 junction. Turn right on I-84 west towards Boise. Continue ahead for I-84/BL-84 towards Glenns Ferry and Twin Falls.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 129 Offramp
item.description: I-84 west Exit 129 offramp. Turn right for King Hill.

item.title: End ID-69 North at I-84/US-30/ID-55
item.description: End ID-69 North at I-84/US-30/ID-55. Turn right for I-84/US-30 East/ID-55 north; continue over freeway for I-84/US-30 West/ID-55 South.

item.title: End ID-69 North Approaching I-84
item.description: End ID-69 north approaching I-84 in Meridian.

item.description: ID-69 south at I-84 east towards Boise. Continue south on ID-69 for Kuna.

item.description: I-84 east Exit 44 offramp at ID-69 junction. Turn left for ID-69 south to Kuna; turn right for Meridian Road to Meridian (City Center).

item.description: Meridian Exits on I-84 west: Eagle Road (ID-55), Meridian Road (ID-69), and Ten Mile Road.

item.description: Rowena Access Road at I-84 (Exit 76) onramp. Turn right for I-84 east to The Dalles. Turn left for I-84 west to Hood River, and to continue under freeway towards Mayer State Park.

item.description: W 2nd St. in The Dalles at US-30 and I-84 east junction. Turn right for I-84 east, to Pendleton, and US-30 west. Continue ahead on 2nd St. for US-30 east. Turn left for the Port Area along the Columbia River.

item.title: W 2nd St. Approaching US-30
item.description: W 2nd St. approaching US-30 in The Dalles.

item.title: US-30 West - Downtown The Dalles
item.description: E 2nd St. west in downtown The Dalles. Use right lanes to continue west on US-30 toward Portland.

item.title: US-30 West at SE Frontage Road
item.description: US-30 west at SE Frontage Road.

item.title: US-197 South/US-30 West at Split
item.description: US-197 South/US-30 West at US-197/US-30 split. Turn right for US-30 west to The Dalles. Turn left for US-197 south to Dufur and Bend.

item.title: US-97 North at I-84/US-30 West
item.description: US-97 north at I-84/US-30 West (Exit 104). Turn left for I-84/US-30 west to The Dalles. Continue north on US-97 towards Yakima (Washington). US-97 crosses over the Columbia River into Washington immediately north of this junction. The Columbia River and the hills of Washington state are in the background of this photograph.

item.description: US-97 north at I-84/US-30 (Exit 104) junction. Turn right on I-84/US-30 east for Rufus and Pendleton. Continue over freeway for I-84/US-30 west to The Dalles. The Columbia River, and bridge over the Columbia River into Washington is in the background of the photograph.

item.description: I-84 north at I-84 Frontage Road, and approaching I-84/US-30 junction. Turn left on the Frontage Road for Deschutes State Park. Continue north on US-97 for I-84 junction, and Yakima (Washington). The Columbia River and Washington state are in the background of the photograph.

item.title: I-84 East - Meridian Exits
